item.title: Hands-on fund managers drive ETF growth
item.description: BlackRock's Jay Jacobs predicts active exchange-traded fund management will provide significant value in 2026 amid stock market volatility.

item.title: Ford cuts electric F-150 Lightning production, takes $19.5B charge in strategic shift
item.description: Ford cuts F-150 Lightning production as CEO Jim Farley shifts strategic focus to hybrids and affordable EVs, taking massive $19.5 billion charge.

item.title: Cannabis stocks surge on report Trump seeks to ease restrictions
item.description: President Donald Trump is expected to push for marijuana reclassification from Schedule I to Schedule III status, sending cannabis stocks soaring.

item.title: Automaker gears up for self-driving future with new chip
item.description: Rivian announced a breakthrough autonomy chip and subscription service for hands-free driving across 3.5 million miles of roads starting early 2026.
